=API for ns-utils=
by Stephen C. Gilardi

Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:require clojure.contrib.ns-utils))
}}}
==Overview==
<pre> Namespace utilities</pre>


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#dir dir] [#docs docs] [#get-ns get-ns] [#ns-vars ns-vars] [#print-dir print-dir] [#print-docs print-docs] [#vars vars]

====macro====
<pre>
Usage: *(_dir_ nsname)*
</pre>
<pre> Prints a sorted directory of public vars in a namespace</pre>
